:postbox: *Release of V1 of the Post listing module!*
The new version of the post listing module comes with modern styling options, enhanced performance via Javascript rendering and adds additional content support via module fields for more flexibility in module design.

*When:* v1 of the Post listing default modules will be released on March 27th, 2024.

*Who it affects:* Only net new portals created on or after March 27th, 2024 will get the v1 versions of the Post listing default module. All existing portals will continue to have v0. *If you're a marketplace provider who references the post listing module in your marketplace theme, you'll want to make sure you account for both versions in your theme.*

*Why:* We are continually making improvements to all of our modules to make them more modern and flexible as well as to utilize our new infrastructure. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/default-asset-versioning#post-listing|Check out the internal developer documentation here.>
